src:
Totenhem u Beogradu - epizoda 4
Slavni engleski klub u srpskoj prestonci ima učinak 1-1-1

05 Nov 2019


Totenhem u Beogradu - čin četvrti. Dok čekamo da se Pevci iskrcaju na teritoriju Srbije, nije zgoreg podsetiti se prethodna tri gostovanja slavnog londonskog kluba u prestonom gradu. Imajući u vidu da Englezi nisu baš sjajno prolazili na našim prostorima, pogotovo u vreme SFRJ, može se reći da klub sa Vajt Hart Lejna ima pristojan učinak. 

Sva tri najpopularnija beogradska kluba odmeravala su se sa Totenhemom i sva tri puta srpski timovi završavali bi takmičenje posle tih duela. Prvo OFK Beograd, pa Crvena zvezda i naposletku Partizan, s tim što su crno-beli igrali grupnu fazu i nakon nje ispali, pa se ne može reći da ih eliminisao direktno Totenhem. Pevci u Beogradu imaju učinak 1-1-1, uz gol razliku 2:2.
U proleće 1963. godine Romantičari sa Karaburme dočekali su Totenhem u okviru prvog meča polufinala Kupa pobednika kupova. Bila je to sezona najvećih evropskih uspeha OFK Beograda kog su do velikih podviga vodili Sava Antić, Vidinić, Marić, Gugleta, Paja Samardžić, Joško Skoblar, Banović... Osokoljeni velikim trijumfom nad Napolijem, a posle majstorice u Marselju, pavo-beli su maštali o prvom evropskom finalu za neki klub sa prostora bivše Juge. Bilo je to vreme kada je OFK pronosio slavu jugoslovenskog fudbala gde god se pojavio. Pariski Rasing pobeđen je u prijateljskom meču sa 8:2, Bajern Minhen sa 4:1, padali su i Fajenord, Dukla, Panatinaikos... Ali to polufinale 1963. bilo je nepremostivo.„Naš tehnički rukovodilac Kika Popović pričao nam je bajke o Totenhemu. Često je zbog službe putovao u London i gledao njihove utakmice. Mislim da nas je možda i bespotrebno zaplašio“, pričao je jednom prilikom Paja Samardžić, jedan od najboljih igrača te generacije.
OFK Beograd je veliku šansu propustio u Beogradu. Igralo se na stadionu Jugoslovenske narodne armije uz 40.000 ljudi na tribinama. Englezi nisu bili bolji, ali su pobedili i to sa igračem manje, pošto je Džimi Grivs, jedan od najboljih svetskih napadača onog doba, isključen u 54. minutu posle koškanja sa Krivokućom. Kuriozitet je da je to bilo prvo isključenje za nekog igrača Totenhema posle 40 godina, odnosno prvi i jedini crveni karton za Grivsa u celoj karijeri?!„Nismo imali iskustva za takvu jednu utakmicu, nismo imali taktiku... Naš trener Milovan Ćirić bio je dobar čovek, ali nije umeo da nas pripremi. Ne može se s engleskim timom prsa u prsa. Tehnički oni su bili daleko ispod nas, međutim, taktika je nešto drugo. Tada smo za njih u tom segmentu bili amateri“, dodao je Samardžić.



Prilikom isključenja Grivsa rezultat je bio 1:1. Domaći su kidisali na gol Engleza do samog kraja, ali jedinu loptu iz mreže vadio je Blagoje Vidinić. Beograđni su se u revanšu držali dobro u prvih 45 minuta, golom Skoblara čak ozbiljno uplašili Engleze, međutim pali su u nastavku. Završeno je sa 3:1 za Totenhem, koji će kasnije u finalu pregaziti Atletiko Madrid sa 5:1 za svoj prvi evropski trofej. 
Devet godina posle okršaja sa OFK Beogradom Pevci su drugi put u Beogradu. Ovoga puta na drugoj strani Topčiderskog brda. U sezoni u kojoj će Miljan Miljanić osvojiti svoju poslednju titulu sa Crvenom zvezdom, njegovi momci nisu se proslavili u Evropi. Totenhem je bio ispod nivoa najboljih engleskih klubova u to vreme - Liverpula, Lidsa i Arsenala, pa su se u Ljutice Bogdana nadali da bi mogli da nadoknade 0:2 sa Vajt Hart Lejna i prođu u četvrtfinale. Posle slabih prvih 45 minuta, drugi deo otvorio je pogodak Vojina Lazarevića u 49. minutu. Uobičajeni pas Dragana Džajića sa boka i... Oko 70.000 duša na tribinama Marakane iščekivalo je drugi gol punih 40 minuta, ali Englezi su uspeli da se odbrane i prođu dalje. Njih će u polufinalu zaustaviti Liverpul.
Crvena zvezda je beogradskom revanšu sa Totenhemom nastupila u sastavu: Ognjen Petrović, Petar Krivokuća, Vladislav Bogićević, Miroslav Pavlović, Kiril Dojčinovski, Miodrag Novković (od 50. Dušan Nikolić), Vladimir Petrović (od 77. Zoran Filipović), Stanislav Karasi, Vojin Lazarević, Jovan Aćimović, Dragan Džajić. 



Poslednji put u Beogradu i drugi put na stadionu Partizana Totenhem je gostovao 18. septembra 2014. godine, na startu takmičenja u Ligi Evrope. U grupi sa crno-belima, Bešiktašom i AEL-om, Pevci su bili apsolutni favoriti za prvo mesto, što će kasnije i potvrditi, ali beogradski početak nije baš obećavao. Ekipa Maurisija Poketina nadigrana je u dobrom delu susreta, nedostajao je samo završni udarac čete Marka Nikolića. Meč je završen bez golova i to je bio jedan od dva boda Partizana te evropske jeseni.
Partizan: Lukač - B. Ilić, Stanković, Ćirković, Volkov - Marković, Ninković, S. Ilić, Grbić - Lazović, Škuletić.Totenhem: Loris - Noton, Vertongen, Kirikeš, Dejvis - Lenon, Lamela, Dembele, Stambuli, Paulinjo - Soldado.

Jedini klub sa prostora bivše Jugoslavije koji je uspeo da tuče Totenhem, uz Crvenu zvezdu te 1972, jeste splitski Hajduk. Splićani su čak šest puta igrali protiv Pevaca i dva puta uspeli da ih dobiju na Poljudu.
Sada je ponovo Zvezda na potezu...
text:
Tottenham in Belgrade - episode 4
The famous English club in the Serbian capital has a 1-1-1 effect

05 Nov 2019


Tottenham in Belgrade - rank four. As we wait for the Singers to land on the territory of Serbia, it is not outrageous to be reminded of the previous three guest appearances of the famous London club in the capital city. Considering that the English did not perform very well in our area, especially during the SFRY, it can be said that the club with White Hart Lane has a decent effect.

All three of Belgrade's most popular clubs competed against Tottenham and all three Serbian teams would finish the competition after those duels. First OFK Belgrade, then Red Star and finally Partizan, with the black and whites playing the group stage and afterwards, so it cannot be said that they were eliminated directly by Tottenham. Singers in Belgrade have a 1-1-1 performance, with a goal difference of 2: 2.
In the spring of 1963, the Romantics of Karaburma welcomed Tottenham as part of the first match of the Cup Winners' Cup. It was the season of the greatest European successes of OFK Belgrade, led by great feats led by Sava Antic, Vidinic, Maric, Gugleta, Paja Samardzic, Josko Skoblar, Banovic ... Enraged by the great triumph over Napoli, and after the master in Marseille, they were white and white dreamed of the first European final for a club from the former Yugoslavia. It was a time when OFK spread the glory of Yugoslav football wherever it appeared. Paris Racing won in a friendly match 8: 2, Bayern Munich 4: 1, and fell Fayenord, Dukla, Panathinaikos ... But that semifinal in 1963 was insurmountable. "Our technical manager Kika Popovic told us fairy tales about Tottenham. He often traveled to London to watch their matches because of his service. I think it may have unnecessarily frightened us, ”said Paja Samardzic, one of the best players of that generation, on one occasion.
OFK Belgrade missed a big chance in Belgrade. It was played at the Yugoslav National Army Stadium with 40,000 people in the stands. The English were no better, but they won less with the player, as Jimmy Grievs, one of the world's best strikers of the time, was ruled out in the 54th minute after missing a curveball. The curiosity is that it was the first shutdown for a Tottenham player after 40 years, or the first and only red card for Grievs in his entire career ?! a good man, but he could not prepare us. He can’t go with the English team chest to chest. Technically they were far below us, however, the tactic is something else. At that time, we were amateurs in that segment, "Samardzic added.



The Grivs shutdown resulted in a 1: 1 score. The home side had the English goal to the end, but Blagoje Vidinic had the only ball out of the net. The Belgrade retained well in the first 45 minutes, even with the Skoblar goal, they even frightened the English, but fell below. It ended with a 3-1 draw for Tottenham, who would later beat Atletico Madrid 5-1 in the final for their first European trophy.
Nine years after the feud with OFK Belgrade, the Singers are in Belgrade for the second time. This time on the other side of Topcider Hill. In the season in which Miljan Miljanic will win his last title with the Red Star, his boys did not celebrate in Europe. Tottenham were below the level of the best English clubs at the time - Liverpool, Leeds and Arsenal, so they hoped in the Angry Bogdan that they could make it 0-2 from White Hart Lane and reach the quarterfinals. After a weak first 45 minutes, the second half opened a shot by Vojin Lazarevic in the 49th minute. The usual Dragan Dzajic pass from the sidelines and ... About 70,000 souls in the stands of Marakana waited for the second goal for a full 40 minutes, but the English managed to defend themselves and move on. They will be stopped by Liverpool in the semifinals.
The Red Star appeared in the Belgrade rematch with Tottenham: Ognjen Petrovic, Petar Krivokuca, Vladislav Bogicevic, Miroslav Pavlovic, Kiril Dojcinovski, Miodrag Novkovic (since 50. Dusan Nikolic), Vladimir Petrovic (since 77. Zoran Filipovic), Stanislav Karasi, Vojin Lazarevic, Jovan Acimovic, Dragan Dzajic.



He made his last appearance in Belgrade and for the second time at the Partizan Stadium Tottenham on September 18, 2014, at the start of the Europa League competition. In the group with black and whites, Besiktas and AEL, the Singers were absolute favorites for the first place, which will be confirmed later, but the Belgrade start was not very promising. Mauritius Poketin's team was outplayed for the good part of the match, missing only the finishing shot of Marko Nikolic's company. The match ended with no goals and it was one of the two points of Partizan that European autumn.
Partizan: Lukac - B. Ilic, Stankovic, Cirkovic, Volkov - Markovic, Ninkovic, S. Ilic, Grbic - Lazovic, Skuletic. Tottenham: Loris - Noton, Vertongen, Kirikes, Davis - Lennon, Lamela, Dembele, Istanbul, Paulinho - Soldado.

The only club from the territory of the former Yugoslavia that managed to beat Tottenham, with the Red Star in 1972, is Hajduk Split. The citizens of Split have played six times against the Singers and twice managed to win them at Poljud.
Now the Star is on the move again ...
